name: IBM Liberty serverfarm topology - VMware vSphere
description: This template will install the Liberty server farm topology with 2 nodes.

metadata.longDescription: This template will install the Liberty server farm topology with 2 nodes.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1) Liberty server - Central Node
2) Liberty server - Application Node

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
Central node
aws: - t2.micro, Storage = 20GB
- VCPU = 1, Memory = 4GB, Storage = 20GB
Liberty node
aws: - t2.micro, Storage = 20GB
- VCPU = 1, Memory = 4GB, Storage = 20GB

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
- Installation is via Installation Manager, please ensure this has been correctly installed on the Repo Server.
- Modify the libertynode_was_liberty_edition variable in CAM Variables to change the installation type to base, core or nd.
- The plugin is generated on all nodes and merged on the Central node.
